section.h3: The most popular activities in the Internet
How anxious do people feel about posting with their real name
How anxious do people feel about posting something controversial with their real name
Using real name in the Internet
Using real picture in the Internet
Did people feel safe in the Internet?
Did people feel that they have enough knowleadge about the Internet to make this decisions

section.h1: 1. People(Mostly students) ale always connected to the Internet
2. People are quite anxious about posting, but they do it any way.
3. People are confused about their knowledge of the Internet Security
